original_title: Holly Hippo's Book Club: Beauty and the Beast
overview: Join Holly Hippo's Book Club, as Holly and her best friend Mandy discuss their favorite book! Are you ready to find out the ins and outs of some of the best stories ever written? If so, take a seat and crack open your favorite book as Holly and Mandy lay down the facts! This time the sassy duo discusses one of the most beloved fairytales of them all, Beauty And The Beast! Be part of the club with Holly Hippo's Book Club: Beauty And The Beast!
title: Holly Hippo's Book Club: Beauty and the Beast
